name: Off-channel storage
functionStatement: Wetlands and storage features store floodwater, recharge groundwater, sustain baseflow, and provide low-velocity habitat.
descriptionMarkdown: Side channels/beaver ponds/oxbows connect during moderate floods, providing off-channel storage and habitat.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Map side channels and oxbows and verify whether they connect at about bankfull stage. Use simple inundation mapping if needed.

levels.label: Strongly Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Off-channel features mostly gone or permanently cut off
Criteria: Off-channel features mostly gone or permanently cut off

levels.label: Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Only large floods (>5-10 yr) access these areas
Criteria: Only large floods (>5-10 yr) access these areas

levels.label: Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Partial connection or few off-channel areas
Criteria: Partial connection or few off-channel areas

levels.label: Strongly Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Side channels, oxbows, and beaver wetlands connected near bankfull
Criteria: Multiple features connect during moderate (bankfull) floods
